<!-- repo: team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk -->
<!-- ref: main -->
<!-- commit: 146cc88845ea4c877e07e0204bcf541e5b69ed4a -->
<!-- generated_at: 2025-11-17T07:23:13Z -->
# Platform: iOS

## /
- [Package](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Package.swift): Defines the Swift Package Manager manifest for the `notifly_sdk` iOS library, declaring the `FirebaseMessaging` dependency, iOS 15+ platform, and mapping the `notifly_sdk` target to the `SourceCodes` and `PrivacyInfo.xcprivacy` sources.
- [Readme](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/README.md): README for the iOS Notifly SDK, documenting platform/toolchain requirements (iOS 15+, Xcode 15+, Swift 5+), current CocoaPods version badge, and linking to the external developer guide for integration and usage details.

## NotiflyIOSSample/NotiflyIOSSample
- [Notiflyiossampleapp](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/NotiflyIOSSample/NotiflyIOSSample/NotiflyIOSSampleApp.swift): Defines the SwiftUI entry point for the sample app, bridging to `AppDelegate` via `@UIApplicationDelegateAdaptor` and exposing the main `ContentView` while capturing the root `UIWindow` from the active `UIWindowScene` for use by the SDK.
- [Appdelegate](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/NotiflyIOSSample/NotiflyIOSSample/AppDelegate.swift): Configures Firebase and Notifly on launch, manages APNs registration and device tokens, forwards notification delegate callbacks to `Notifly` and Firebase Messaging, and handles custom URL scheme deep links via `DeepLinkManager` as the app’s `UIApplicationDelegate`.
- [Deeplinkmanager](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/NotiflyIOSSample/NotiflyIOSSample/DeepLinkManager.swift): Singleton `DeepLinkManager` (`ObservableObject`) parses incoming deep-link `URL`s into query-parameter dictionaries, logs their components, and publishes validated parameters (name starting with "deeplink") via `@Published deepLinkParameters` for SwiftUI views to react to.
- [Deeplinkview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/NotiflyIOSSample/NotiflyIOSSample/DeepLinkView.swift): SwiftUI view that displays parsed deep link parameters and, on appear, routes based on the `name` parameter to either open or modally present `https://notifly.tech` via `UIApplication`/`SFSafariViewController`, exposing `parameters` as the primary initialization input.
- [Contentview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/NotiflyIOSSample/NotiflyIOSSample/ContentView.swift): Sample SwiftUI entry screen that triggers Notifly SDK events (`sample_push_event`, `sample_popup_event`), integrates deep link handling via `DeepLinkManager.shared.

## NotiflyIOSSample/NotiflyNotificationExtension
- [Notificationservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/NotiflyIOSSample/NotiflyNotificationExtension/NotificationService.swift): Implements the notification service extension by subclassing `NotiflyNotificationServiceExtension`, automatically registering the app with Notifly using a hard-coded `projectId` and `username` during initialization to enable enhanced push notification handling.

## NotiflyTestApp/NotiflyNotificationExtension
- [Notificationservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/NotiflyTestApp/NotiflyNotificationExtension/NotificationService.swift): NotificationService.swift defines a `NotiflyNotificationServiceExtension` subclass that initializes the Notifly SDK for the notification service extension and registers it with the project ID and username from `TestConstant` when handling incoming push notifications.

## NotiflyTestApp/NotiflyTestApp/SourceCodes
- [Testconstant](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/NotiflyTestApp/NotiflyTestApp/SourceCodes/TestConstant.swift): Defines `TestConstant`, an internal enum providing hard-coded test credentials (`username`, `password`) and a `projectID` for the Notifly test app, used to configure or authenticate SDK-related test flows.

## NotiflyTestApp/NotiflyTestApp/SourceCodes/UI
- [Trackingtestviewcontroller](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/NotiflyTestApp/NotiflyTestApp/SourceCodes/UI/TrackingTestViewController.swift): UIViewController test harness that builds a form-driven UI to configure and queue `Notifly.trackEvent` calls (including custom/segmentation params, internal flag) while subscribing via Combine to `Notifly.
- [Mainviewcontroller](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/NotiflyTestApp/NotiflyTestApp/SourceCodes/UI/MainViewController.swift): `MainViewController` is the primary UIKit entry screen in the test app, wiring text fields and buttons to initialize Notifly with test credentials, display auth/push tokens, and navigate to tracking, push notification, and user settings test view controllers.
- [Pushnotificationtestviewcontroller](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/NotiflyTestApp/NotiflyTestApp/SourceCodes/UI/PushNotificationTestViewController.swift): UIViewController that builds a form-driven UI with stack views for configuring test push notification parameters (title, body, URL, delay) and, on schedule button tap, validates inputs and invokes `scheduleNotificationWithCurrentIntputs()` to trigger Notifly scheduling logic.
- [Appdelegate](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/NotiflyTestApp/NotiflyTestApp/SourceCodes/UI/AppDelegate.swift): Configures Firebase and Notifly on launch, requests and registers for APNS notifications, forwards remote-notification registration/failure callbacks and UNUserNotificationCenter delegate events to `Notifly` (including in-app message event listener), and sets itself as the notification center delegate.
- [Usersettingstestviewcontroller](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/NotiflyTestApp/NotiflyTestApp/SourceCodes/UI/UserSettingsTestViewController.swift): Test UI view controller that lets developers input and submit user ID, phone number, email, timezone, and arbitrary user properties to the `Notifly` SDK (`setUserId`, `setPhoneNumber`, `setEmail`, `setTimezone`, `setUserProperties`) and view textual responses.
- [Scenedelegate](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/NotiflyTestApp/NotiflyTestApp/SourceCodes/UI/SceneDelegate.swift): Implements the `UIWindowSceneDelegate` for the test app, handling scene lifecycle and deep-link entry via `scene(_:openURLContexts:)` by parsing `pushnotiflyios://navigation?name=.

## NotiflyTestApp/NotiflyTestApp/SourceCodes/UI/Util
- [Uistackview+](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/NotiflyTestApp/NotiflyTestApp/SourceCodes/UI/Util/UIStackView+.swift): Adds convenience helpers on `UIStackView` to build labeled text field, switch, CTA button, read-only info, and separator rows with consistent constraints, using UIKit layout anchors and a `UITextField.setToDefaultUI()` styling dependency.
- [Keyvaluedatainputviewcontroller](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/NotiflyTestApp/NotiflyTestApp/SourceCodes/UI/Util/KeyValueDataInputViewController.swift): Presents a scrollable UI for creating/editing multiple key–value string pairs using `SingleKeyValueInputView` rows, initialized with optional existing data, and returns the validated dictionary via `KeyValueDataInputViewControllerDelegate.keyValueDataInputVCWilComplete` when the Save CTA is tapped.
- [Uitextfield+](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/NotiflyTestApp/NotiflyTestApp/SourceCodes/UI/Util/UITextField+.swift): Adds a `UITextField` extension with `checkAndRetrieveValueText` for trimmed non-empty text validation that optionally toggles error/default border colors, plus helpers `setToErrorUI` and `setToDefaultUI` for configuring the field’s border color.

## Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/Infrastructures/API
- [Notiflyapi+request](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/Infrastructures/API/NotiflyAPI+Request.swift): Defines `NotiflyAPI.RequestBuilder`, a Combine-based HTTP request builder that configures URL, method, auth headers (including default Notifly SDK metadata), optional JSON-encoded `ApiRequestBody`, and fires requests returning decoded `Response<T>` or raw JSON `String`.
- [Notiflyapi](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/Infrastructures/API/NotiflyAPI.swift): Defines `NotiflyAPI`, a Combine-based internal HTTP client that builds authenticated `RequestBuilder` requests to Notifly endpoints for session authorization, event tracking with token-refresh retry logic, and sync state retrieval, depending on `NotiflyConstant`, `Notifly.main.

## Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/Infrastructures/Auth
- [Auth](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/Infrastructures/Auth/Auth.swift): Manages asynchronous session authorization using Combine, initiating login via `NotiflyAPI.authorizeSession`, caching tokens in `NotiflyCustomUserDefaults`, exposing an `authorizationPub`/`refreshAuth()` publisher flow with timeout handling, cancellation storage, and error-wrapped token emission.

## Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/Infrastructures/InAppMessage
- [Userstate+constant](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/Infrastructures/InAppMessage/UserState+Constant.swift): Defines core in-app message user state models and utilities (UserData, CampaignData, EventData, EventIntermediateCount, UserStateConstant) responsible for parsing backend payloads, generating event aggregation IDs, merging/clearing state, and preparing data for sync, relying on AppHelper/NotiflyHelper/InAppMessageConstant.
- [Inappmessage+constant](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/Infrastructures/InAppMessage/InAppMessage+Constant.swift): Defines in-app messaging constants (syncState API URL, segment operators, element ID separator, injected JavaScript bridge to `notiflyInAppMessageEventHandler`, channel name) and the `InAppMessageData` payload struct (IDs, modal props, URL, deadline, re-eligibility) used by the in-app message infrastructure.
- [Userstatemanager](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/Infrastructures/InAppMessage/UserStateManager.swift): Manages thread-safe, per-owner in-app messaging user state (campaignData, userData, eventData), synchronizes it with Notifly backend via `syncState(postProcessConfig:handleExternalUserIdMismatch:completion:)`, handles external user ID mismatch resolution, and exposes mutation/query helpers like `incrementEic` and `getInAppMessageCampaigns()`.
- [Inappmessagemanager](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/Infrastructures/InAppMessage/InAppMessageManager.swift): Coordinates user state, campaign rules, and timing to determine eligible in-app message campaigns on events, prepares `InAppMessageData`, schedules UI presentation via `WebViewModalViewController`, and exposes listener-based `dispatchInAppMessageEvent` hooks while respecting hide/re-eligibility constraints.
- [Segmentationhelper](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/Infrastructures/InAppMessage/SegmentationHelper.swift): Evaluates whether a user/event matches a campaign’s condition-based segment by OR-ing segmentation groups and AND-ing their user- and event-based conditions, using `UserData`, `EventData`, event params, and `NotiflyValueComparator`, including whitelist/testing and last-N-days event count logic.
- [Campaign](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/Infrastructures/InAppMessage/Campaign.swift): Defines the `Campaign` model and related types for in-app messaging, parsing raw campaign payloads into strongly typed triggering conditions, event filters, segmentation rules, message/modal properties, and re-eligibility constraints, with validation and matching utilities for events and user context.
- [Webviewmodalviewcontroller](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/Infrastructures/InAppMessage/WebViewModalViewController.swift): Implements `WebViewModalViewController`, a full-screen `WKWebView`-backed in-app message modal that configures size/position/masking from `ModalProperties`, injects JS, handles web-to-native message events (`notiflyInAppMessageEventHandler`), tracks/dispatches Notifly in-app events, and manages per-campaign visibility state.

## Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/Infrastructures/Notifications
- [Notificationsmanager](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/Infrastructures/Notifications/NotificationsManager.swift): Manages APNs/FCM device token acquisition with Combine-based `deviceTokenPub`, retry/timeout logic, and FirebaseMessaging integration, handles `UIApplication`/`UNUserNotificationCenterDelegate` notification callbacks, tracks token-related internal events via `Notifly`, and supports local push scheduling.

## Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/Infrastructures/Tracking
- [Trackingmanager](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/Infrastructures/Tracking/TrackingManager.swift): Implements `TrackingManager`, which builds `TrackingRecord` objects from user/internal events (including session, device, and push-click events), triggers in-app messaging side effects, and publishes `TrackingEvent` payloads via Combine to `NotiflyAPI.trackEvent`, exposing `track*` methods and response publishers.

## Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/Infrastructures/User
- [Usermanager](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/Infrastructures/User/UserManager.swift): Manages external and derived Notifly user IDs with thread-safe caching and persistence, triggers user-state sync/merge/clear flows via `inAppMessageManager.userStateManager`, and exposes `setExternalUserId`, `setUserProperties`, and `getNotiflyUserID` as primary entry points.

## Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/Notifly
- [Notifly+helper](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/Notifly/Notifly+Helper.swift): Defines internal helper utilities and comparators for Notifly, including event name namespacing, SDK version/type resolution (`NotiflySdkConfig`), date and re-eligibility timestamp calculations (`AppHelper`, `TimeConstant`), generic value comparison (`NotiflyOperator`, `NotiflyValueType`), and string comparison/regex matching (`NotiflyStringOperator`).
- [Notifly+publicapi](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/Notifly/Notifly+PublicAPI.swift): Contains all available Notifly SDK Public APIs.
- [Notifly](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/Notifly/Notifly.swift): Defines the core `Notifly` singleton that initializes and wires authentication, tracking, user, notifications, and in-app messaging managers, manages shared async worker and cold-start data, and exposes `setup(..

## Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/NotiflyExtension
- [Notiflyextensionapi](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/NotiflyExtension/NotiflyExtensionAPI.swift): Implements `NotiflyExtensionAPI`, which authorizes using stored credentials, caches/refreshes auth tokens, builds JSON HTTP requests via `ExtensionRequestBuilder`, and exposes `track(payload:completion:)` to post tracking events to `NotiflyConstant.EndPoint` with automatic 401 retry handling.
- [Notificationserviceextension](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/NotiflyExtension/NotificationServiceExtension.swift): Implements the `NotiflyNotificationServiceExtension` entry point to register project credentials, intercept and enrich push notifications with remote media attachments via `ExtensionManager.show`, and track delivery events using `NotiflyExtensionAPI`, `NotiflyCustomUserDefaults`, and tracking helpers.

## Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/NotiflyUtil
- [Constants](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/NotiflyUtil/Constants.swift): Defines core SDK configuration and tracking constants (versions, endpoints, event names, user property keys, time units), plus value/operator enums (NotiflyValueType, NotiflyOperator, NotiflyStringOperator, NotiflyTriggeringConditonType) and the NotiflyValue wrapper used across Notifly’s tracking and rule-evaluation flows.
- [Notiflyerror](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/NotiflyUtil/NotiflyError.swift): Defines the `NotiflyError` enum used across the SDK to standardize error reporting for initialization, authorization, token acquisition (APNs/FCM/device), payload validation, promise timeouts, and unexpected nil values, conforming to Swift’s `Error` protocol.
- [Apphelper](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/NotiflyUtil/AppHelper.swift): Provides utility APIs for retrieving a stable Notifly-specific device ID (keychain UserDefaults backed, derived from `UIDevice.identifierForVendor` and hashed), current timestamp, app version, iOS platform/version, and bundle identifier.
- [Logger](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/NotiflyUtil/Logger.swift): Provides a simple `Logger` utility with static `info` and `error` methods that print Notifly-formatted log messages to stdout, using an internal `Level` enum and a private initializer to prevent instantiation.
- [Notiflycustomuserdefaults](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/NotiflyUtil/NotiflyCustomUserDefaults.swift): Provides a static wrapper around `UserDefaults` (optionally using an app group suite) that namespaces values by `projectId` and exposes typed accessors for project/user credentials and APNs registration state via `register(projectId:org:)` and computed properties.
- [Timezone](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/NotiflyUtil/Timezone.swift): Provides `TimezoneUtil` helpers for retrieving the current device timezone identifier (`getCurrentTimezoneId`) and validating arbitrary timezone IDs against `TimeZone.knownTimeZoneIdentifiers`, used wherever timezone-aware behavior is required in the SDK.
- [Messagedata](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/NotiflyUtil/MessageData.swift): Defines `PushAttachment`, which parses and validates push notification attachment payloads into typed image/video metadata (URL, extension, UTType via MobileCoreServices) using `AttachmentType` and throws `NotiflyError` on invalid input for downstream notification handling.
- [Asyncworker](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/NotiflyUtil/AsyncWorker.swift): Coordinates serialized, semaphore-guarded async tasks with timeout-based auto-unlock, maintaining a FIFO queue and token-based completion validation via `addTask(lockAcquired:task:)` while internally scheduling execution and recovery on a dedicated `DispatchQueue`.
- [Uuid+](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/NotiflyUtil/UUID+.swift): Provides a UUID v5 helper initializer that generates deterministic, SHA-1–based UUIDs from a name and namespace using CommonCrypto, plus a `notiflyStyleString` computed property returning a hyphenless UUID string.
- [Trackingevent](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/NotiflyUtil/TrackingEvent.swift): Defines the request encoding layer for tracking and authentication, including `ApiRequestBody` and `RequestPayload` polymorphic encoders, event batching via `TrackingEvent`/`TrackingRecord`, the detailed `TrackingData` payload model, and the public `SdkWrapperType` enum for wrapper SDK identification.
- [Credentials](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/NotiflyUtil/Credentials.swift): Defines a simple `Codable` `Credentials` value type encapsulating a `userName` and `password` for serialization, storage, or transmission within the Notifly SDK authentication flows.
- [Anycodable](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdk/SourceCodes/NotiflyUtil/AnyCodable.swift): Defines `NotiflyAnyCodable`, a wrapper around `Any?` that implements `Codable` to serialize/deserialize heterogeneous JSON-compatible values (Bool, Int, Double, String, arrays, dictionaries) and exposes the helper API `parseJsonString(_:)` to decode JSON strings into `[String: Any]?

## Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdkTests
- [Notifly Ios Sdktests](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdkTests/notifly_ios_sdkTests.swift): Defines the `notifly_ios_sdkTests` `XCTestCase` scaffold for functional and performance tests of the `notifly_ios_sdk` module, providing `setUpWithError`, `tearDownWithError`, `testExample`, and `testPerformanceExample` as entry points for SDK-level test implementations.
- [Asyncworkerverbosesmoketests](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/team-michael/notifly-ios-sdk/main/Sources/Notifly/notifly-ios-sdk/notifly-ios-sdkTests/AsyncWorkerVerboseSmokeTests.swift): Integration-style XCTestCase validating `NotiflyAsyncWorker` guarantees—single active concurrency, FIFO start order, first-wins timeout vs. finish behavior, idempotent finish, nested `lockAcquired` handling, and stress behavior—with detailed logging via `CaseLog` and `addTask` as the primary exercised API.
